label: [{"start":0,"end":7,"text":"磺胺类药物中毒","labels":["disease"]},{"start":15,"end":20,"text":"磺胺类药物","labels":["drug"]},{"start":36,"end":41,"text":"中毒性疾病","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 磺胺类药物中毒是由于临床上使用磺胺类药物剂量大，连续用药时间长发生的一种中毒性疾病。

label: [{"start":0,"end":5,"text":"磺胺类药物","labels":["drug"]},{"start":49,"end":50,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]}]
text: 磺胺类药物在兽医临床上是常用药物，如剂量过大，连续用药时间长，饮水或饲料投药时搅拌不均，可导致部分鸡食入量加大而发病；有时因剂量计算错误而发生中毒事故。

label: [{"start":2,"end":6,"text":"急性发病","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":12,"end":14,"text":"兴奋","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":15,"end":17,"text":"腹泻","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":18,"end":20,"text":"厌食","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":21,"end":25,"text":"渴欲增加","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":26,"end":30,"text":"鸡冠苍白","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":28,"end":30,"text":"苍白","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":31,"end":35,"text":"头部肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":33,"end":35,"text":"肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":36,"end":39,"text":"蓝紫色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":40,"end":42,"text":"痉挛","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":43,"end":45,"text":"麻痹","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":26,"end":28,"text":"鸡冠","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":31,"end":33,"text":"头部","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":7,"end":9,"text":"病鸡","labels":["type"]}]
text: 多为急性发病，病鸡表现为兴奋、腹泻、厌食、渴欲增加，鸡冠苍白，头部肿大，蓝紫色，痉挛或麻痹；

label: [{"start":6,"end":10,"text":"慢性中毒","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":12,"end":14,"text":"病鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":14,"end":18,"text":"精神沉郁","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":19,"end":23,"text":"食欲不振","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":32,"end":36,"text":"鸡冠苍白","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":34,"end":36,"text":"苍白","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":37,"end":43,"text":"头部肿大发紫","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":39,"end":43,"text":"肿大发紫","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":46,"end":48,"text":"便秘","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":51,"end":53,"text":"下痢","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":60,"end":64,"text":"发育受阻","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":68,"end":73,"text":"产蛋率下降","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":75,"end":79,"text":"产畸形蛋","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":29,"end":31,"text":"贫血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":32,"end":34,"text":"鸡冠","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":37,"end":39,"text":"头部","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":54,"end":56,"text":"幼鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":57,"end":60,"text":"青年鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":65,"end":68,"text":"产蛋鸡","labels":["type"]}]
text: 有时可能发生慢性中毒，则病鸡精神沉郁，食欲不振或废绝，也见贫血，鸡冠苍白，头部肿大发紫，有时便秘，有时下痢，幼鸡、青年鸡发育受阻，产蛋鸡产蛋率下降，并产畸形蛋。

label: [{"start":0,"end":2,"text":"病鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":14,"end":20,"text":"内脏器官出血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":18,"end":20,"text":"出血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":3,"end":5,"text":"皮下","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":6,"end":10,"text":"皮下组织","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":11,"end":13,"text":"肌肉","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":14,"end":18,"text":"内脏器官","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 病鸡的皮下、皮下组织、肌肉、内脏器官出血是其特征。

label: [{"start":2,"end":8,"text":"凝血时间延长","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":9,"end":14,"text":"白细胞减少","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":12,"end":14,"text":"减少","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":9,"end":12,"text":"白细胞","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 1.凝血时间延长，白细胞减少。

label: [{"start":2,"end":4,"text":"肌肉","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":5,"end":7,"text":"肾脏","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":8,"end":10,"text":"肝脏","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 3.肌肉、肾脏、肝脏中药物含量，应不超过20毫克/千克。

label: [{"start":0,"end":7,"text":"磺胺类药物中毒","labels":["disease"]},{"start":21,"end":26,"text":"磺胺类药物","labels":["drug"]},{"start":27,"end":34,"text":"投药时掌握剂量","labels":["control"]},{"start":38,"end":46,"text":"饮水内要搅拌均匀","labels":["control"]}]
text: 磺胺类药物中毒以预防为主，选择毒副作用小的磺胺类药物，投药时掌握剂量，饲料、饮水内要搅拌均匀。

label: [{"start":2,"end":7,"text":"磺胺类药物","labels":["drug"]},{"start":7,"end":9,"text":"肠道","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":15,"end":19,"text":"磺胺嘧啶","labels":["drug"]},{"start":24,"end":31,"text":"磺胺二甲基嘧啶","labels":["drug"]},{"start":37,"end":42,"text":"磺胺喹噁啉","labels":["drug"]}]
text: 有些磺胺类药物肠道容易吸收，如磺胺嘧啶(SD)、磺胺二甲基嘧啶(SM₂)、磺胺喹噁啉(SQ)等，其治疗量和中毒量非常接近。

label: [{"start":36,"end":38,"text":"鸡只","labels":["type"]},{"start":13,"end":19,"text":"准确配制浓度","labels":["control"]},{"start":20,"end":27,"text":"控制好用药时间","labels":["control"]}]
text: 所以，应用此类药物时，必须准确配制浓度，控制好用药时间，避免发生抗药性和鸡只中毒。

label: [{"start":10,"end":14,"text":"立即停药","labels":["control"]},{"start":15,"end":23,"text":"改用其他抗菌药物","labels":["control"]},{"start":19,"end":23,"text":"抗菌药物","labels":["drug"]},{"start":30,"end":35,"text":"磺胺类药物","labels":["drug"]}]
text: 发现有中毒症状时，应立即停药，改用其他抗菌药物，或者尽量不用磺胺类药物。

label: [{"start":2,"end":7,"text":"磺胺类药物","labels":["drug"]},{"start":11,"end":18,"text":"给予足够的饮水","labels":["control"]},{"start":20,"end":28,"text":"加强鸡群饲养管理","labels":["control"]},{"start":22,"end":24,"text":"鸡群","labels":["type"]}]
text: 服用磺胺类药物同时，应给予足够的饮水，并加强鸡群饲养管理，促进鸡体健康，缩短用药时间。

label: [{"start":0,"end":5,"text":"磺胺类药物","labels":["drug"]},{"start":8,"end":13,"text":"家禽传染病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":14,"end":18,"text":"寄生虫病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":19,"end":25,"text":"常用抗菌药物","labels":["drug"]},{"start":26,"end":27,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]}]
text: 磺胺类药物是防治家禽传染病和寄生虫病的常用抗菌药物，鸡对其敏感。

label: [{"start":15,"end":19,"text":"磺胺嘧啶","labels":["drug"]},{"start":24,"end":30,"text":"磺胺二甲嘧啶","labels":["drug"]},{"start":36,"end":43,"text":"磺胺间甲氧嘧啶","labels":["drug"]},{"start":49,"end":54,"text":"磺胺喹噁啉","labels":["drug"]},{"start":86,"end":92,"text":"磺胺二甲嘧啶","labels":["drug"]},{"start":6,"end":8,"text":"肠道","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 其中特别是在肠道中容易吸收的如磺胺嘧啶(SD)、磺胺二甲嘧啶(SM2)、磺胺间甲氧嘧啶(SMM)、磺胺喹噁啉(SQ)等，这些药物的中毒量和治疗量相差不大，故容易中毒。其中以磺胺二甲嘧啶的毒性最大。

label: [{"start":24,"end":25,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":48,"end":51,"text":"小母鸡","labels":["type"]}]
text: 用药剂量过大，或连续用药。据报道，4~12周龄的鸡饲喂含0.25%的饲料1周即可中毒，130日龄小母鸡饲喂含0.5%的饲料11天即开始死亡。

label: [{"start":0,"end":5,"text":"复方敌菌净","labels":["drug"]}]
text: 复方敌菌净在饲料中添加至0.036%,第6天即引起死亡。

label: [{"start":0,"end":5,"text":"复方新诺明","labels":["drug"]},{"start":20,"end":22,"text":"雏鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":25,"end":27,"text":"肾肿","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":25,"end":26,"text":"肾","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":28,"end":32,"text":"维生素K","labels":["drug"]},{"start":37,"end":44,"text":"磺胺类药物中毒","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 复方新诺明混饲用量超过三倍以上，即可造成雏鸡严重的肾肿。维生素K缺乏可促发磺胺类药物中毒。

label: [{"start":0,"end":2,"text":"病鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":4,"end":11,"text":"全身出血性变化","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":12,"end":16,"text":"急性中毒","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":19,"end":21,"text":"兴奋","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":22,"end":24,"text":"拒食","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":25,"end":27,"text":"腹泻","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":28,"end":32,"text":"共济失调","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":33,"end":35,"text":"痉挛","labels":["pathology"]}]
text: 病鸡具有全身出血性变化。急性中毒表现为兴奋、拒食、腹泻、共济失调和痉挛等症状。

label: [{"start":0,"end":4,"text":"慢性中毒","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":4,"end":6,"text":"仔鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":8,"end":12,"text":"精神沉郁","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":13,"end":17,"text":"食欲减退","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":18,"end":22,"text":"渴欲增加","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":23,"end":27,"text":"生长缓慢","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":33,"end":36,"text":"头肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":34,"end":36,"text":"肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":37,"end":40,"text":"发蓝色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":41,"end":51,"text":"排酱油状或灰白色稀粪","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":46,"end":49,"text":"灰白色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":33,"end":34,"text":"头","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":50,"end":51,"text":"粪","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 慢性中毒仔鸡表现精神沉郁，食欲减退，渴欲增加，生长缓慢或停止，有时头肿大且发蓝色，排酱油状或灰白色稀粪。

label: [{"start":0,"end":4,"text":"成年母鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":4,"end":11,"text":"产蛋量明显下降","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":12,"end":18,"text":"蛋壳粗糙变薄","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":21,"end":24,"text":"产软蛋","labels":["symptom"]}]
text: 成年母鸡产蛋量明显下降，蛋壳粗糙变薄，有时产软蛋。

label: [{"start":15,"end":21,"text":"脏器广泛出血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":19,"end":21,"text":"出血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":6,"end":8,"text":"皮肤","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":9,"end":11,"text":"皮下","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":12,"end":14,"text":"肌肉","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":15,"end":17,"text":"脏器","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":25,"end":27,"text":"胸肌","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":28,"end":32,"text":"大腿肌肉","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 特征性变化为皮肤、皮下、肌肉和脏器广泛出血，尤其以胸肌和大腿肌肉表现明显。

label: [{"start":6,"end":17,"text":"腺胃有点状或长条状出血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":15,"end":17,"text":"出血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":27,"end":37,"text":"心脏有出血点或坏死点","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":34,"end":37,"text":"坏死点","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":30,"end":33,"text":"出血点","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":42,"end":45,"text":"肾肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":43,"end":45,"text":"肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":46,"end":51,"text":"输尿管增粗","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":49,"end":51,"text":"增粗","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":52,"end":59,"text":"充满白色尿酸盐","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":54,"end":56,"text":"白色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":0,"end":2,"text":"肠道","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":3,"end":5,"text":"肌胃","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":6,"end":8,"text":"腺胃","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":18,"end":20,"text":"骨髓","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":18,"end":22,"text":"骨髓黄染","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":20,"end":22,"text":"黄染","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":23,"end":24,"text":"肝","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":25,"end":26,"text":"脾","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":27,"end":29,"text":"心脏","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":38,"end":39,"text":"肝","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":40,"end":41,"text":"脾","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":42,"end":43,"text":"肾","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":46,"end":49,"text":"输尿管","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 肠道、肌胃与腺胃有点状或长条状出血。骨髓黄染，肝、脾、心脏有出血点或坏死点。肝、脾、肾肿大，输尿管增粗，充满白色尿酸盐。

label: [{"start":13,"end":18,"text":"磺胺类药物","labels":["drug"]},{"start":20,"end":25,"text":"复方新诺明","labels":["drug"]},{"start":26,"end":31,"text":"磺胺喹噁啉","labels":["drug"]},{"start":32,"end":37,"text":"磺胺氯吡嗪","labels":["drug"]},{"start":7,"end":18,"text":"选择毒性小的磺胺类药物","labels":["control"]}]
text: 应以预防为主，选择毒性小的磺胺类药物，如复方新诺明、磺胺喹噁啉、磺胺氯吡嗪等。

label: [{"start":0,"end":5,"text":"控制好剂量","labels":["control"]},{"start":31,"end":40,"text":"保证供给充足的饮水","labels":["control"]}]
text: 控制好剂量，使用该类药物时间不宜过长，一般连用不超过1周。注意保证供给充足的饮水。

label: [{"start":4,"end":6,"text":"雏鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":9,"end":12,"text":"磺胺药","labels":["drug"]},{"start":15,"end":17,"text":"肝脏","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":21,"end":23,"text":"雏鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":23,"end":25,"text":"肝脏","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":37,"end":40,"text":"产蛋鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":44,"end":49,"text":"磺胺类药物","labels":["drug"]}]
text: 3周龄的雏鸡慎用，磺胺药主要在肝脏中代谢，雏鸡肝脏解毒功能低，易发生中毒。产蛋鸡禁止使用磺胺类药物。

label: [{"start":4,"end":10,"text":"立即更换饲料","labels":["control"]},{"start":11,"end":20,"text":"停止饲喂磺胺类药物","labels":["control"]},{"start":21,"end":27,"text":"供给充足饮水","labels":["control"]},{"start":15,"end":20,"text":"磺胺类药物","labels":["drug"]}]
text: 发现中毒立即更换饲料，停止饲喂磺胺类药物，供给充足饮水。

label: [{"start":10,"end":13,"text":"小苏打","labels":["drug"]},{"start":16,"end":21,"text":"葡萄糖溶液","labels":["drug"]},{"start":38,"end":42,"text":"维生素C","labels":["drug"]},{"start":47,"end":52,"text":"维生素K3","labels":["drug"]},{"start":74,"end":79,"text":"维生素B₂","labels":["drug"]},{"start":85,"end":87,"text":"叶酸","labels":["drug"]},{"start":70,"end":71,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":72,"end":74,"text":"肌注","labels":["control"]}]
text: 在饮水中加入1.5%小苏打和5%葡萄糖溶液，连饮3~4天。每千克饲料中可加入维生素C0.2g和维生素K30.5mg,连用3～4天。中毒严重的鸡可肌注维生素B₂1～2mg或叶酸50~100μg。
